paragraphs.title: 1 - Markdown
paragraphs.text:
%md 
# Apache Zeppelin + Apache Spark + Apache Cassandra

## Useful links:

* [The Spark Cassandra Connector github repository](https://github.com/datastax/spark-cassandra-connector)
* [Introduction to CQL](http://docs.datastax.com/en/cql/3.3/cql/cqlIntro.html)
* [Using CQL](https://docs.datastax.com/en/cql/3.3/cql/cql_using/useAboutCQL.html)

## Requirements:

Load ```com.datastax.spark:spark-cassandra-connector_2.11:2.0.2``` dependency and add ```spark.cassandra.connection.host=cassandra``` property to the spark interpreter

msg.data:
Apache Zeppelin + Apache Spark + Apache Cassandra

Useful links:

  • The Spark Cassandra Connector github repository
  • Introduction to CQL
  • Using CQL

Requirements:

Load com.datastax.spark:spark-cassandra-connector_2.11:2.0.2 dependency and add spark.cassandra.connection.host=cassandra property to the spark interpreter

paragraphs.title: 2 - Download csv file
paragraphs.text:
%sh

wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/victorcouste/zeppelin-spark-cassandra-demo/master/albums.csv

# Or download direclty the demo CSV file from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/victorcouste/zeppelin-spark-cassandra-demo/master/albums.csv

paragraphs.title: 3 - Spark :  load csv file in dataFrame
paragraphs.text:
%spark

//Display Spark version used
println("Spark version:"+spark.version)

val df_albums = spark.read
        .format("csv")
        .option("header", "true") //reading the headers
        .option("mode", "DROPMALFORMED")
        .csv("albums.csv").cache

df_albums.show

paragraphs.title: 7 - SparkSQL On DataFrame  2
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT country,count(*) as nb FROM spark_albums_table group by country

paragraphs.title: 9 - Cassandra CQL : Tables creation

msg.data:
• DESCRIBE TABLE albums;
  • Legend
    •  Cluster
    •   Keyspace
    •   UDT
    •   Table
    •   Materialized View
    •   Function
    •   Aggregate
    • Table icons
    •   Partition Key
    •   Static Column
    •   Clustering Column
    •   Clustering Order ASC
    •   Clustering Order DESC

 albums
Column Type Column Name Data Type
album text
artist text
country text
quality text
status text
year text
As CQL statement 

CREATE TABLE ks_music.albums (
    album text,
    artist text,
    country text,
    quality text,
    status text,
    year text,
    PRIMARY KEY (album)
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 864000
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
   AND caching = { 'keys' : 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition' : 'NONE' }
   AND comment = ''
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy' }
   AND compression = { 'sstable_compression' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99.0PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048;

paragraphs.title: 13 - Write Spark DataFrame In Cassandra 2
paragraphs.text:
val df_nbalbyms_by_year = sqlContext.sql("SELECT year,count(*) as nbalbums FROM spark_albums_table group by year")

df_nbalbyms_by_year.show

df_nbalbyms_by_year.write
.format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
.option("header","false")
.mode("overwrite")
.options(Map( "table" -> "nbalbums_by_year", "keyspace" -> "ks_music"))
.save()

paragraphs.title: 16 - SparkSQL table from Cassandra table
paragraphs.text:
%sql
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE table_albums
USING org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra
OPTIONS ( cluster "Test Cluster", keyspace "ks_music", table "albums", pushdown "true")

paragraphs.title: 17 - SparkSQL query on Cassandra Data
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select country, count(*) as count from table_albums group by country having count>${albumCountThreshold=1000} order by count

msg.data:
